title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + Investigative Writing the ^ Story
description: An IRE 2009 presentation on investigative story writing by Laura Frank.
